sn35.141:1.2: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo cakkhussa uppadaya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:1.3: Dukkhasambhutam, bhikkhave, cakkhu kuto sukham bhavissati …pe…
sn35.141:1.5: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo jivhaya uppadaya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:1.6: Dukkhasambhuta, bhikkhave, jivha kuto sukha bhavissati …pe…
sn35.141:1.8: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo manassa uppadaya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.141:1.9: Dukkhasambhuto, bhikkhave, mano kuto sukho bhavissati.
